data.name: BrowserExitConfirmationMessage
data.value: Leaving this page will mean that any changes made to this {0} will be lost.
data.comment: this is the message which appears when the user has unsaved work and the browser window is closed [eg: Leaving this page will mean that any changes made to this SmartObject will be lost.] [common]

data.name: CancelButtonText
data.value: Cancel
data.comment: this is the text which appears on the Cancel button on a pop up message box used throughout the application [common]

data.name: Confirmation
data.value: Confirmation
data.comment: this is the title of the confirmation message pop up used throughout the application [common]

data.name: DesignerExitConfirmationMessage
data.value: Do you want to stop editing this {0} and lose any changes?
data.comment: this is the message which appears when the user has unsaved work and the user navigates away [eg: Do you want to stop editing this SmartObject and lose any changes?] [common]

data.name: Error
data.value: Error
data.comment: this is the title of the error message pop up used throughout the application [common]

data.name: NoButtonText
data.value: No
data.comment: this is the text displayed on a No button used throughout the application [common]

data.name: Notification
data.value: Notification
data.comment: this is the title used for general notification pop up messages used throughout the application [common]

data.name: OKButtonText
data.value: OK
data.comment: this is the text which appears on the OK button on a pop up message box used throughout the application [common]

data.name: ParameterDefaultValueBooleanValidation
data.value: You have to supply a default value of 'true', 'false', '1', '0', 'yes' or 'no' for a parameter of type Boolean.

data.name: ParameterDefaultValueNumericValidation
data.value: You have to supply a numeric default value for a parameter of type Number.

data.name: SubformRuleDependency
data.value: There are Rules dependent on this item. All dependencies will be removed.

data.name: WorkflowRuleDependency
data.value: This rule contains workflow actions. Deleting it may cause workflow errors.
data.comment: This is the message displayed by the Form Designer when deleting a rule that has a workflow action. [Design time]

data.name: Warning
data.value: Warning
data.comment: this is the title of a warning message pop up which appears when the user does something wrong [common]

data.name: YesButtonText
data.value: Yes
data.comment: this is the text displayed on a Yes button used throughout the application [common]

data.name: CustomCodeDialog_Header
data.value: Custom Code Found
data.comment: this is header text for the custom code dialog warning message when user check-in views/forms

data.name: CustomCodeDialog_Title
data.value: Have you tested?
data.comment: this is title for the custom code dialog warning message when user check-in views/forms

data.name: CustomCodeDialog_Details
data.value: We've noticed that your form/view has a custom theme or custom CSS/JavaScript.
data.comment: this is details for the custom code dialog warning message when user check-in views/forms

data.name: CustomCodeDialog_Details_Plural
data.value: We've noticed that your forms/views have custom themes or custom CSS/JavaScript.
data.comment: this is details for the custom code dialog warning message when user check-in views/forms

data.name: CustomCodeDialog_Accept
data.value: I've tested
data.comment: this is acceptance checkbox text for the custom code dialog warning message when user check-in views/forms

data.name: CustomCodeDialog_MoreInfo_Title
data.value: Table Updates (June 2020)
data.comment: this is title for the custom code dialog warning message more info section when user check-in views/forms

data.name: CustomCodeDialog_MoreInfo_Detail
data.value: The table control used for layouts was improved and this is the first time you're checking in this item. It is possible that your customizations are affected.
data.comment: this is detail for the custom code dialog warning message more info section when user check-in views/forms

data.name: CustomCodeDialog_MoreInfo_ReadMore
data.value: Read more...
data.comment: this is read more link text for the custom code dialog warning message more info section when user check-in views/forms

data.name: SpinnerValueNotInValues
data.value: You have entered an invalid value. Only {0} is allowed.

data.name: SpinnerValueNotInRange
data.value: You have entered an invalid value. Only values between {0} and {1} are allowed.

data.name: SpinnerValueNotInValuesOrSpecials
data.value: You have entered an invalid value. Only {0} or {1} is allowed.

data.name: SpinnerValueNotInRangeOrSpecials
data.value: You have entered an invalid value. Only values between {0} and {1} or {2} are allowed.

data.name: OrText
data.value: or

data.name: RuleDependencyMsg
data.value: There are Rules dependent on this item. Dependent items will no longer be valid.

data.name: NameExistsInTargetCategoryWarning
data.value: You cannot create a {0} with the name '{1}' in the target category. Either rename the object, select a different category, or make sure you have the correct permissions to view the category and create the object.
data.comment: this is the the message displayed when a user creates or moves an object into a category where an object with the same name already exists [eg: A SmartObject with the name 'SmartObjectABC' already exists in the target category. Either rename the object, select a different category, or make sure you have the correct permissions to view the category and deploy the object.]

data.name: NamesExistInTargetCategoryExtendedWarning
data.value: Either rename the objects, select different categories, or make sure you have the correct permissions to view the categories and create the objects.
data.comment: this is the text displayed below the list of items on the warning message pop up when multiple objects already exist in a category with the same name while trying to generate a view and a form

data.name: NamesExistInTargetCategoryWarning
data.value: You cannot create the items below in the selected categories:
data.comment: this is the text displayed above the list of items on the warning message pop up when multiple objects already exist in a category with the same name while trying to generate a view and a form

data.name: WorkflowStateDependency
data.value: This state contains rules which have workflow actions. Deleting it may cause workflow errors.
data.comment: This is the message displayed by the Form Designer when deleting a state that has a workflow action. [Design time]

data.name: ListControlPropertyConfigSmartObjectInvalidWarning
data.value: The currently selected SmartObject no longer exists, please select another SmartObject to continue.
data.comment: This is the message displayed by the Form Designer when user tries to modify the display template for a Data Soure bound to a Control where the Data Source is missing or invalid. [Design time]

data.name: ListControlPropertyConfigSmartObjectHasNoAssociations
data.value: The selected SmartObject does not have any associations to other SmartObjects.
data.comment: This is the message that is displayed while configuring a list control's datasource if you try pick a lookup smartobject when the association smartobject does not have any associations to other smartobjects.
